    org.apache.storm.Testing.getLocalCluster​(Map<String, Object>)
    use ``` try (LocalCluster cluster = new LocalCluster.Builder()....build()) { ... } ```
    org.apache.storm.Testing.globalAmt​(String, String)
    org.apache.storm.Testing.mkTrackedTopology​(ILocalCluster, StormTopology)
    use TrackedTopology directly.
    org.apache.storm.Testing.withLocalCluster​(TestJob)
    use ``` try (LocalCluster cluster = new LocalCluster()) { ... } ```
    org.apache.storm.Testing.withSimulatedTime​(Runnable)
    use ``` try (Time.SimulatedTime time = new Time.SimulatedTime()) { ... } ```
    org.apache.storm.Testing.withSimulatedTimeLocalCluster​(TestJob)
    use ``` try (LocalCluster cluster = new LocalCluster.Builder().withSimulatedTime().build()) { ... } ```
    org.apache.storm.Testing.withTrackedCluster​(TestJob)
    use ``` try (LocalCluster cluster = new LocalCluster.Builder().withTracked().build()) { ... } ```
